numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some people do not have a legacy.
3. People who do not have a legacy have a significantly lower chance of getting into college than people who have a legacy.
4. Some schools have a legacy policy.
5. I wonder why schools have a legacy policy.
6. I think that all applicants should have an equal chance of getting into different schools.
7. I am a legacy for different schools.
8. This legacy status might give me a chance to get into college.
9. The title of the graph is "Your Chances of Getting into Different Colleges".
